short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate random strings for various uses

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A chrome browser extension to generate random
strings according to the definition you may
choose.

Currently, there is no check for forbidden
values, and no complexity / quality check,
i.e. for several character classes required
in a password.

A next version will also output encrypted
passwords for insertion in passwd file.
